title: Viral Video Of Motorist Beating The Heat Is Not From Rajasthan
subtitle: The viral post falsely claims that temperature in Rajasthan has touched 52 degree centigrade and people are forced to take on-road showers
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
"52 degrees centigrade in Rajasthan, please see how riders take the on-road shower from social service volunteers".

The video received on BOOM's helpline is not from Rajasthan but Pakistan. The original video, uploaded on Dawn's YouTube channel on May 30, 2018, can be seen here.
